articles.author: Dylan Stableford
articles.title: 'No Amazon, no Walmart, no fast food': What's behind the 'Feb. 28 economic blackout' - Yahoo
articles.description: The People's Union USA, a self-described “grassroots movement” founded by John Schwarz, is encouraging Americans to refrain from making non-essential...
articles.content:
A grassroots organization is calling on Americans to participate in what its calling the "Feb. 28 economic blackout" by refraining from buying goods from major retailers for 24 hours.
The nationwide… [+3320 chars]
